    Simon Ilincev

    Backend Python & JavaScript developer interested in server-side web development and automation.

    About me...

    Hi, I’m Simon, an American high schooler currently living in Europe. I enjoy programming and language learning, and primarily develop with Nuxt.js and Flask.

    Efficiency

    I strive to write clean, concise, and readable code that gets the job done.

    Transparency

    Most of my projects are open-source on GitHub with permissive licenses.

    View my work...

    Effectiveness

    My work has been viewed and used by thousands globally.

    Sharing my knowledge

    The road to programming mastery is long and difficult, and I believe that the easier we can make it for people, the better. I document my journey, tips, and tricks in my coding blog.

    See the blog...

    Constantly Learning

    As the great American scientist Benjamin Franklin once said: Without continual growth and progress, such words as improvement, achievement, and success have no meaning. I take this to heart as I spend my free time working on projects, mastering courses, and reading educational books.

    Follow my journey...

    Contact Me

    If you have any questions, offers, or comments, please don’t hesitate to let me know! You can reach me at simon [at] simonilincev [dot] com or on GitHub.
